Alternate Admonitions

HTML version of the Admonition plugin.

Primary purpose of this snippet is getting Admonitions to work on Obsidian Publish. Alternate Admonitions has the same markdown support and limitations as the Aside Snippet.

Get CSS Snippet Here

Syntax

<s class="ad note">==**Title**==
Text
</s>

<s class="ad info">==**Title**== Text</s>
